code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic [3:0] x,
    output logic f
);
    always @(*) begin
        f = (x[2] & ~x[3] & ~x[1] & ~x[0]) | 
            (x[2] & ~x[3] & x[1] & x[0]) | 
            (x[2] & x[3] & ~x[1] & ~x[0]) | 
            (x[2] & x[3] & x[1]) | 
            (x[3] & ~x[2] & x[1] & x[0]);
    end
endmodule
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
